settings.title: KidsLiving
settings.paragraph: Est. 2008 in Cape Town, now a leading South African baby and kids store, offering an extensive range of imported and locally manufactured high-end products. We have worked with Kids Living since 2017 as their ecommerce success partners, covering all aspects from inventory management, digital marketing, web development to complete custom API solutions.
settings.list:
Web Development

Custom Features Development

Custom App Integrations

Monthly SEO & Site maintenance support

settings.title: From challenge to solution
settings.paragraph: How we overcome Kids Livings challenge on having their product information on BigCommerce and on an outdated POS system to an all round solution with VEND and Shopify. Continuously working with them to help their online business succeed.

settings.title: Analysis & Migration
settings.paragraph: When we first took over the website, we first needed to understand the information and data that needed to be sorted through and migrated to the Shopify platform from BigCommerce. Our team did an extensive analysis and created a strategic plan that ensured the old website's SEO, content, and web rankings were kept intact taking into account a VEND to Shopify integration.
settings.list:
Organising product data

Migrate Images from Products, Categories, Blog Description

Customer data Migration

Product and Order information migration

Vend to Shopify integration

Redirect all changed links

Content migration

settings.title: Shopify web development
settings.paragraph: With the migration complete and a strategic plan in place. Our team started developing the Shopify website. This was specifically tailored to our clients’ needs while taking to account the key functions and features that our clients required from their old website.
settings.list:
Theme Coding & Implementation

Content structure update, for user experience optimization

Vend to Shopify integration

Shopify Apps Integration & Configuration

Payment & Shipping Zones Set-Up

Product & Inventory Set-Up

Shopify SEO Implementation and optimization

settings.title: Site maintenance & SEO
settings.paragraph: With the website successfully launched and live to the public, our team gets to work on creating monthly plans on improving and optimization our client’s website. They continually use and develop cutting-edge SEO tools and crawling software to identify and analyze technical SEO factors that needs to be addressed. They also work on product content research and creation. Consistently working on the website and keeping up to date with the ever-evolving online environment.
settings.list:
Website data backup

Stand by for website queries or requests

Website updates and customizations

Evaluating current keyword rankings

Identifying and creating quality links

Content research & creation

Product content quality analysis and update

settings.title: SEO & Site maintenance support
settings.paragraph: Our team uses and develops cutting-edge SEO tools and crawling software to identify and analyze technical SEO factors that needs to be addressed. Using this data, we form a list of action items and, every month, slowly worked through each one of those areas. We continuously update our SEO strategy to remain flexible with the ever-changing landscape.
settings.list:
Evaluating current keyword rankings

Identifying and creating quality links

Product content quality analysis and update

Obtaining on-topic quality links from niche directories and sites

settings.title: We have worked with KidsLiving  on a large number of unique features
settings.paragraph: Our team of Shopify web developers work closely with our clients to create a selection of suitable options, and unique features that perfectly represent their vision and needs.

settings.title: Custom builder
settings.paragraph: This custom builder helps you create your own stroller by choosing elements like fabric styles, frame options and wheel types. It shows the changes in real life creating an interactive purchase experience for people who want a custom product they built themselves.

settings.title: Mega menu & custom brand section
settings.paragraph: This custom build was created to organize a large amount of product categories in a user friendly manner. Highlight was also given on the brands, organising them Alphabetically while showcases the top popular brands.

settings.title: Google rating integration
settings.paragraph: This integration helps increase the overall trust of visitors to the store by showcasing their live google ratings.

settings.title: Logo Banner
settings.paragraph: This custom build helped showcase the key large brands that kidsliving offers, interating the logos flawlessly into the websites home page.

settings.title: More to expect when working with us...

settings.title: Website Analysis
settings.paragraph: In depth testing for performance for key metrics such as speed, traffic, search engine optimization (SEO), and user experience.
settings.paragraph_old: Our team performs thorough site analysis to determine your website’s conversion opportunities, threats, weaknesses, and strengths. We run SEO audits, test your site speed and functionality, and analyse your site traffic. These methods allow us to improve your site usability and increase your site engagement and conversions.

settings.title: Conversion Rate Optimization
settings.paragraph: From A/B testing to UX analysis and design, we ensure all aspects of your website are optimized for conversion.
settings.paragraph_old: Our team focuses on optimizing your sites speed by eliminating unnecessary form fields, placing clear calls-to-action and simplifying your page navigations. We also perform A/B testing to ensure all aspects of your website are optimized for conversion.

settings.title: Preventative Maintenance
settings.paragraph: Regular site maintenance is crucial to ensure your site is running at its optimum. We also do scheduled site check-ups with backups.
settings.paragraph_old:
Regular site maintenance is crucial to ensure
your website is running at full capacity. We conduct scheduled site check-ups
to determine your website's key aspects that need improvement. Using the
analytics results, we develop strategies to enhance your site security, boost
your traffic and optimize your page experience.

settings.title: Project Communication
settings.paragraph: We take the time to regularly communicate to our clients keeping them updating on our processes and encourage feedback.
settings.paragraph_old: We focus on developing customized processes to fit your needs. We understand that each client is different and work in different ways. We take the time to regularly communicate to our clients keeping them updating on our processes and encourage feedback. For the convenience of our clients, our meetings/communications are done via email, whatsapp or video conferencing.

settings.title: We offer a large range of unique customizations and add ons
